name: 2025 11th International Conference on Humanity and Social Sciences
content: Publication: Submissions will be reviewed by at least two conference technical committees or international reviewers, and accepted papers will be published into SHS Web of Conferences (Open Access proceedings in Humanities and Social Sciences, eISSN: 2261-2424), which will be submitted to be indexed by CNKI, CPCI (Web of Science), Google Scholar, DOAJ, etc.
organizers: Kyushu University and National Taiwan Normal University, Taipei, Taiwan
